titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: = "1f erne"? address shorthand? = "s. lan look"? = could be "Farm," "Form," "Foam"

body.ab:
1936 CANLORBE Mlle Nicole. 16 rue Franklin Mme Thellier de Poncheville 2 Ave de Jardin Botannique La Madeleine Lille 3m. 1v. 40.00. Oct 29 lady will see if dep. ever refunded Deposit 30.00 ref. Dec 13 Dec 30. New Irish Comedies Jan 8 All men are enemies Jan 5 Jan 8 Ave. Jan 14 14 Salve. Jan 21 21 Vale. Feb. 3. Feb. 3 Our Irish Theatre. Feb. 15. 15 Mary Mary March 4 Black Mischief March 4 March 4 Eyeless in Gaza 1v a day 4v March 8 8 Three Wonder plays March 12 Mar 12 Irish Drama. 4v May 12 25 Sparkenbroke. 12 Renewed 3m. 1v. - June 30th 40v Sent pc. May 5 May 12 Third act in Venice 1v.00 May 28 (suspended 1m 2 days left will pay fees for overdues when MM counts them up) overdues 9.00 f July 19 - Aug. 21 REnewed 19 Together and Apart July 28 19 28 sent pc. of closing.
July 28 It had to happen Sept 20 White Horses of Vienna } holidays Anna of the 5 towns Sept 20 Passage to India Sept 20 Renewed 1 m 1 v Sept 20- Oct 20 1937 35 v Sept 20 My Next Bridge Oct 29 Wedding Day & other stories Oct 29 paid fine 9 v for 9 days overdue
